item.title: In Ukraine, Technology Only Thickens the Fog of War
item.description: The conflict in Ukraine has been ongoing for years, with no clear end in sight. As technology advances, it has become increasingly intertwined with the conflict, with both sides utilizing it to gain an advantage. On May 17, 2023, Bloomberg published an article titled “In Ukraine, Technology Only Thickens the Fog of War” by Leonid Bershidsky.

item.title: In Pursuing Peace, Japan's Leader Must Also Prepare for War
item.description: On May 16th, 2023, The Washington Post published an article titled “In Pursuing Peace, Japan’s Leader Must Also Prepare for War” by an unknown author[^1^][1]. The article talks about how Fumio Kishida, Japan’s leader, is working towards nuclear disarmament while simultaneously moving the nation closer to being the world’s largest nuclear power.
